## REMOVE\_ADMIN\_MUTATION variable

The REMOVE\_ADMIN\_MUTATION remove the admin from the organization. It validates the user, organization from the respective id passed and deletes the admin in the org record.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
REMOVE_ADMIN_MUTATION: import("graphql").DocumentNode
```

## Remarks

This mutation is declared in talawa-API. Documentation for this mutation can find [here](https://github.com/PalisadoesFoundation/talawa-api/blob/develop/lib/resolvers/admin_mutations/removeAdmin.js)
